instruction: Can Raman spectroscopy and machine learning be considered superior to traditional methods in characterizing the biochemical changes associated with acquired radioresistance for breast cancer cells?
Output: Yes. This suggests that Raman spectroscopy and machine learning may be superior to traditional methods in characterizing the biochemical changes associated with acquired radioresistance for breast cancer cells.
